Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Nagaritha Drive, north of the Circle-Bar Ranch.
Room.LongDescription: The Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch is located on the north side of the road, separated by Appleton Road, which runs diagonally through the ranch. On this side of the ranch, you can see the Slaughterhouse where scores of cattle are killed each day to provide for the necessities of the city's citizens.
